items.sentence: I\'d rather clean my room than spend time doing my homework.
I\'m not going to be able to go to Boston with Tom tomorrow.
I\'m sure that Tom would be able to help me if he were here.
I\'m trying to stop Tom from making the same mistakes I did.
I\'ve never been to Boston. However, I have been in Chicago.
Tom couldn\'t answer even one question on yesterday\'s test.
You never told me that you didn\'t know how to speak French.
Are you seriously thinking about starting your own business?
Tom still doesn\'t know where he\'s going to go next summer.
I let Tom know that I was dissatisfied with his performance.
I never thought I would have to support such a large family.
I think the best way to learn English is to live in America.
I think this is the most impressive building on Park Street.
Put the book back on the shelf when you\'re through with it.
The only time Tom seems to be happy is when he\'s with Mary.
Unfortunately, Tom was in the wrong place at the wrong time.
We use gestures as well as words to communicate with others.
What makes you think that Tom prefers living in the country?
When I was a kid, we used to play hide and seek quite a lot.
When are you going to tell Tom that you want to get married?
Tom doesn\'t understand because he wasn\'t paying attention.
Tom\'s dog cowered under the kitchen table during the storm.
Tom\'s heart stopped, but the doctors managed to revive him.
Tom\'s mother always told him he should eat more vegetables.
Tom\'s mother got angry when she saw Tom jumping on his bed.
We can\'t let Tom get away with murdering those four people.
I think you ought to forgive us, now that we\'ve apologized.
I\'m pretty sure that Tom hasn\'t finished his homework yet.
Don\'t ask questions yet. Just listen to what I have to say.
Every author suffers from writer\'s block from time to time.
One of the children is studying, but the others are playing.
Please write down your name, address, and phone number here.
I just don\'t understand why people would want to live here.
I\'m not the only one here who thinks Tom isn\'t a nice guy.
Tom is going to have to do something he doesn\'t want to do.
Tom knew he didn\'t have enough money to buy what he needed.
Tom likes to listen to music while he\'s doing his homework.
Tom and Mary couldn\'t make themselves understood in French.
Tom and Mary haven\'t gone swimming together in a long time.
I ran into an old friend of mine at the party the other day.
I stopped laughing as soon as I noticed that Tom was crying.
I suggest you talk to Tom about how to handle the situation.
Tom said he didn\'t have time to answer all of my questions.
Mary promised her mother that she would help her more often.
I wish Tom wouldn\'t keep telling everyone I\'m his brother.
I won\'t go to tonight\'s party if Tom is going to be there.
Many parents think there\'s too much violence on television.
Nobody knows what it is that has been bothering him so much.
Seen from a distance, the big rock looks like an old castle.
Mary was offended when Tom bought her some breath freshener.
